bibl.title: Letter from J.W. Schereschewsky to Henry Rose Carter, July 12, 1918

div1.p: Schereschewsky authorizes expenditures for Carter's secretarial work.

div1.head: Letter from J.W. Schereschewsky to Henry Rose Carter, July 12, 1918
div1.opener:
EBS
July 12, 1918.
Assistant Surgeon-General H. R. Carter,
U. S. Public Health Service,
Newport News, Va.
Sir:
div1.p:
The Department has authorized the expenditure of not
more than $25.00 a month during the current fiscal year for
the typewriting of your official correspondence and reports
while you are on field duty in connection with rural sanita-
tion. The authority to be cited in the vouchers is Depart-
ment approval of July 9, 1918.
div1.closer:
Respectfully, (Signed) J.W. Schereschewsky
Assistant Surgeon-General. Copy
Original to Newport News
JWS
12856
